patterns: I want a break from life

I just want to pause everything

responses: It’s okay to take a break. Your mental health matters.
Rest is important. Don’t feel guilty for needing time for yourself.
Taking a step back can help you recharge. You deserve peace.
Pausing is a form of strength. Be kind to yourself.
It sounds like you’re under a lot of pressure. I’m here for you.
Remember to breathe. One step at a time.
Stress is tough — can you take a short break or talk to someone about it?
You’re not alone. Many people feel this way, and things can get better.

intents.tag: i will never succeed in life
patterns: I’m never going to make it
responses: Even when it feels impossible, you are still capable of growth and success.
Failure doesn’t define you. Every step forward counts.
Be patient with yourself. Success is not always linear.
You matter — and your journey isn’t over.
It’s okay to feel sad. You’re not alone in this.
Let it out — your emotions are valid.
I’m here for you. It’s okay to not be okay.
Even the darkest night will end. You’re stronger than you think.

intents.tag: i am a victim of bullying
patterns: They keep making fun of me
I’m scared of going to school
responses: You don’t deserve to be treated that way. I’m really sorry you’re going through this.
Please consider talking to someone you trust about what’s happening.
You are not alone. What’s happening to you is not okay.
Your safety and dignity matter. Help is available — you’re not invisible.

intents.tag: i am afraid to file a case against bullying
patterns: What if no one believes me?
I want to speak up but I’m scared
I don’t want to make things worse
responses: Your safety comes first. You have the right to protect yourself.
It’s okay to feel scared. There are people who will believe and support you.
You are not weak for feeling this way. Reporting bullying takes courage.
Consider speaking with someone confidentially first. You don’t have to do this alone.

patterns: I just want to stop trying
This is too much for me
responses: Please don’t give up. You are not alone in this world.
Even when things feel hopeless, there is help and healing ahead.
You are stronger than you realize. Let’s take one small step at a time.
You matter. Please consider reaching out to someone who can help.

intents.tag: i want to leave the country and run away

responses: Sometimes the urge to escape is strong — but you're not alone.
Wanting a fresh start is valid. Let’s talk about what’s making you feel this way.
You don’t have to face everything alone. Your pain is real and heard.
There are better ways to heal than disappearing — and people who care about you.
You are not a failure. You are human and learning.
We all make mistakes — that doesn't mean you're not worthy of love.
One moment doesn’t define your entire life. You are more than that.
You're doing your best, and that’s enough. Be gentle with yourself.

intents.tag: i wish i was better than them
patterns: Why can’t I be as good as them?
I want to be the best
I’m tired of losing to them
responses: You are unique — and that’s your power.
You don’t need to compare yourself to others. You’re enough as you are.
Your worth isn’t defined by being better than someone else.
Focus on your growth. Comparison steals joy — and you deserve peace.

patterns: I don’t deserve to be loved
Everyone would be better without me
responses: Self-hate can feel overwhelming — but please know, you are worthy of love and healing.
You are not alone, and you are not broken. Let’s walk through this together.
The way you talk to yourself matters — you deserve kindness from yourself too.
It’s okay to feel like this, but this feeling doesn’t define you. You are more than your worst thoughts.

intents.tag: i wish i could've been a winner
patterns: I wanted to succeed so badly
Why couldn’t I be the winner?
It was supposed to be me
I trained so hard for nothing
responses: Not winning doesn’t make you a loser — it means you had the courage to try.
You gave your best. That in itself is a powerful thing.
Your worth isn’t tied to a result. It’s in your effort, your heart, your resilience.
This moment doesn’t erase your progress. You’re still moving forward.

patterns: Every time I try, I lose
Why does losing feel like the end?
responses: Losing can hurt — but it’s not the end of your journey.
Even through losses, you grow stronger.
It’s okay to feel upset about losing. But don’t let it define your self-worth.
Every setback is part of the process. You’re still in the game.

intents.tag: i think i'm losing my mind
responses: You’re not alone in feeling this way — but you don’t have to face it alone.
Mental strain can be overwhelming. You deserve care and support.
Please consider speaking with a professional. You deserve help and peace.
Your mind is asking for help, not giving up. Let’s take this one step at a time.
